onna aayimath niyama widiyo kilip ekak hambawuna.dannawane me dawaswala mathata thitha nisa kohomath bonna ehema mara gemak denna onene.meka ithin bona minihata maha wadayak unata nobona aya nam ane hodayi kiya gaththa gamanma thamayi inne.ee ithin hoda nathi nisane.eth bona miniha kochchara epa kiwwath nobi inneth nahane.hariyatama baluwoth marama soya ganimak thamayi arakku kiyanneth.onna meka nam arakku bona ekak gana nemeyi.eewa nam dan dannath thahanamne.me widiyo eken balaganna puluwan ape kattiya bila wadi wunama awidinne kohomada kiyala.bonakattiya nam oona tharam mehema awidala athi aniwaryenma.eeth mathaka nahane.ee nisa meka balala hithaganna thamanuth biwwama mehema neda hasirenne kiyala.habayi me widiyo eke ayanam arakku bila weriwela nemeyi monawa hari gedi wagayak kala mathwela hodada?

wisheshayen rajya madhya aayathana thula deshapalana balahathkarakama harennata nidahas watapitawak aththema natha. 1973 di lekahawus wishesha widhi widhana panatha yatathe pawara ganu labu lekhawus aayathanaya, panatha magin handunwa di athi nithirithiwalata anukulawa pihituwannata pawara ganimen pasu balayata path wu kisidu rajayak piyawara gena natha.
